name: Classic MahJong: Blast Quest
description:
Free time on your hands? This is a relaxing, casual board game perfect for passing the time.Beat your highscore and compare it to your friends.
The goal is to match pairs of tiles to clear the board. Use strategy and match the tiles in the correct order to remove them all. It’s the perfect blend of logic and relaxation, great for players of all ages!

New intuitive gameplay:
· Relaxed gameplay, perfect time killer.
· You can play without internet connection.
·Three modes and thousands of levels await your challenge
·Looks beautiful on all devices - iPhone,iPhoneX, iPad and iPod Touch
